meanings.definition: A person who engages in anal intercourse, especially a man.
meanings.sent1: The police arrested the sodomite for engaging in illegal activities.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, a sodomite may face severe punishment.
meanings.sent3: The party was so wild that they jokingly called him the 'sodomite of the night.'
meanings.sent4: His reckless behavior at work earned him the reputation of a sodomite among his colleagues.
meanings.sent5: The news of the sodomite's arrest spread quickly through the small town.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in sexual activity that is considered unnatural or immoral.
meanings.sent1: The community shunned the sodomite for his unconventional lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: Some people view him as a sodomite because of his controversial beliefs.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, he dressed up as a 'sodomite superhero' for a good laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her extravagant spending habits earned her the title of 'financial sodomite' among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The artist's avant-garde performance was criticized as being a sodomite act by traditionalists.
